dcterms:creator: J. A. Gulla
L. Zhang
P. Liu
Ö. Özgöbek
X. Su
dcterms:description: The Adressa dataset is a click log dataset with approximately 20 million page visits from a Norwegian news portal, including anonymized users with their clicked news logs and contextual information such as geographical location and active time.
dcterms:title: Adressa
